section0.title: The Villa
section0.content: Experience unparalleled luxury with the exclusive rental of our entire villa, offering privacy, comfort, and breathtaking views for an unforgettable stay.
section0.subcontent: Choose to book the entire property and immerse yourself in the splendor of our Proven√ßal villa, a true masterpiece of neo-Provencal design. The villa's layout seamlessly connects two independent wings, allowing for both privacy and togetherness. This exceptional property accommodates up to 10 adults and 3 children, providing ample space for everyone to enjoy.
